tool_description: This API expects a HTTP Post request with a json payload containing rgb colours and it will return a colour palette
name: Colour palette generator
title: Colour palette generator

api_list.name: palette
api_list.description: Get a colour palette by passing in the colours you wish to see on the palette.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://colour-palette-generator.p.rapidapi.com/palette"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "colour-palette-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://colour-palette-generator.p.rapidapi.com/palette"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "colour-palette-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
